section.title: Goal
section.para: The goal of this exercise is to continue the leave request process implementation by adding data to it.
Once completed, the process will be executable and will display automatically generated forms.

section.title: Instructions
section.para: Duplicate the process diagram from the previous exercise to create a v2.0 version.
Add the following data at pool level:

para.emphasis: Duplicate the process diagram from the previous exercise to create a v2.0 version.

listitem.para: In the Studio's top menu, click on "Diagram / Duplicate".
Update the process diagram AND pool version numbers.
Navigate to the "General / Data" and click on "Add".
Enter "leaveStart" as the data name (this is a technical name so it should not contain spaces or special characters).

para.emphasis: Add a data named "dayCount" with the "Integer" type.
Add a data named "isApproved" with the "Boolean" type.
